mapper.insert: insert into designer (dnum, designer, userid) values (seq_designer.nextval, #{designer}, #{userid})
mapper.select: select designer from designer where upper(designer) like upper(#{input})||'%' order by designer
mapper.delete: delete from game_designer where gnum = #{gnum} and dnum = (select dnum from designer where designer=#{designer})
mapper.select: select dnum, designer from ( select dnum, designer from designer where regexp_like(designer, #{gameKeyword},'i') order by CASE WHEN regexp_like(designer, '^'||#{gameKeyword},'i') THEN 1 ELSE 2 END ) where rownum between 1 and 12
